Mod6_Description: While {c_important}Challenging Shout{/c} is active, gain Thorns equal to {c_number}[{SF_12} * 100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life.
Mod5_Description: While {c_important}Challenging Shout{/c} is active, you gain {c_number}{SF_4}{/c} Fury each time you take damage.
Mod4_Description: While {c_important}Challenging Shout{/c} is active, gain {c_number}[{SF_17} *100|%x|]{/c} bonus Maximum Life.
simple_desc: Warlord Skill:  Taunt nearby enemies and take less damage, generating bonus fury when struck.
desc:
{c_label}Cooldown:{/c_label} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c_resource} seconds
Taunt Nearby enemies and gain {c_number}[{SF_11} * 100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction for {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_TAUNT}{/c} seconds.
name: Challenging Shout
